scripts.test: cd tests && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1 && python -m pytest --tb=short
scripts.test:unit: cd tests && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1 && python -m pytest unit/ --tb=short
scripts.test:integration: cd tests && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1 && python -m pytest integration/ --tb=short
scripts.test:coverage: cd tests && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1 && python -m pytest --cov=../lambda --cov-report=html --cov-report=term
scripts.test:watch: cd tests && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1 && python -m pytest -f
